attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We don't want extra salt, sugar (in whatever form) or anything else added to it.  No wonder so many people are overweight these days.  LEAVE IT AS IT IS!!!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
